Name: MsLsaImport
Description: Automatically import MSLSA credentials: 0-never 1-always 2-if principle matches

Name: MsLsaList
Description: Include MSLSA in the credentials list

Name: FileCCList
Description: List of file CCaches to include in listing

Name: PublicIP
Description: Additional public IP address to use (int32)

Name: UseFullRealmList
Description: Use the full list of realms in the New Creds dialog

Name: PromptCacheLifetime
Description: Lifetime of the prompt cache in seconds

Name: ExpiresOn
Description: FILETIME of when the prompt cache is set to expire

Name: Realms
Description: Realm specific configuration (same schema as per identity config)
